actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Emergency Daylight Savings Time Conservation Act of 1973; and to repeal the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to repeal daylight saving time.

summary.text: Eliminates daylight saving time under the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Conservation Act of 1973 and under the Uniform Time Act of 1966.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Emergency Daylight Savings Time Conservation Act of 1973; and to repeal the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to repeal daylight saving time.
